title: Looks like a version of Garamond?
author: Freddycycle

comments.content: Actually more like a Trajan. I think this one happens to be [Minerva Antique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422054801/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/minerva/antiqua/) from T26.
Thanks. Could not find it in any of my books.
